'''Isumenasu''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] who appears in [[Enkanomiya]] after the player completes the [[World Quest]] ''[[The Phaethons' Syrtos]]''.

==Location==
;During ''[[Sunchildren Hide and Seek]]''

{{Quote|Here lies Isumenasu no Mikoto. On his free days, he would go boating, consulting his map of the country.|The Royal Tomb of Isumenasu}}
''(To be added.)''

===Appearance===
Like the other child [[Shades of Tokoyo]], he is a translucent childlike figure without defining physical features.

==Quests and Events==
{{Quests and Events}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* Isumenasu's name is likely derived from {{w|Ismenus}}, one of the sons of the Greek Sun God {{w|Apollo}}. Similarly, Isumenasu is described as enjoying to go boating, while Ismenus is the god of the River Ismenus.
